title: Patch 5.4 broke league

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: After patch 5.4 I can't seem to play a game.  The games are actually happeneing but I can't play.  As soon as loading begins it crashes, brings me to the "You've left a game in progress, Reconnect" screen in the pvp net client.  These are counting as leaves.  Riot please.

replies.body: I just played a game as Jinx with 4 other friends, a premade team. Only myself and sona stayed connected my friends disconnected and reconnected in and out. The game then proceeded for the enemy team to act very poorly and be toxic. This game was aggravating and they won at 16 minutes, then the game was not loss prevented and I believe it should be. All my friends also suffered from leaver buster when they COULD NOT control this.

Honestly, this is complete and utter bull crap. I **did not** receive 1. Bugsplat  or 2. A sign that my game did in fact crash. I **reconnected 5 times** only for the last time to reach 100% and not load in. This also happened with 2 of my other teammates and at the end of a 16 minute game, we didn't even receive a "Loss prevented" and one even received a Leaverbuster. How can that happen when Riot decided to let him load in the *LAST 2 MINUTES*. The enemy team was even** extremely hostile** when we tried to discuss this with them . Honestly, I don't even know how you can fix this big of a screw up.

*my ping was 69
**I Have no added on league 3rd party downloads

Hey folks,

As others have pointed out, the first step to solving this should always be deleting any 3rd party tools you have running with League, like LoLReplay and other recording software. 

Beyond that, here's the useful steps to help us solve the problem:

1. Is the game generating a R3D log? (article on how to get that [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#section-windows) ) If so, please link it here in this thread! If not, letting us know that also helps.

2. Is the crash giving you the "bugsplat" popup? If so, make sure you press submit for that crash report! If not, let us know.

3. Some folks have suggested that deleting your Config folder that lives in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\ solves the problem. (Warning: this will delete all your in-game settings). If that works...also let us know!

4. The last steps are using the repair function, or re-installing League of Legends, if all else is failing. 

Bonus note: If you're trying any of the above solutions, please test out a custom game afterwards to see if it worked before queueing with other folks!

got no bugsplat to send report and it just crashed before even loading the load screen :/ ive deactivated my firewall, reset internet, uninstalled and reinstalled the game, changed my DNS to the google DNS deleted the "config" folder found in the the league of legends folder on my C drive and rebooted my pc anything more i can do?????
Exact same problem.. tried all of the above and it doesnt work

heres another one whenever i try to reconnect it says im having a "firewall issue"....

Thanks so much for this.  I had like 9 versions of lolreplay installed!

> [{quoted}](name=zznoobtubesxx,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=jEEw7piH,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-02-26T02:56:48.633+0000)
>
> Thanks so much for this.  I had like 9 versions of lolreplay installed!

where did you go to delete lolreplay? i want to make sure ive deleted it completely
I went to control panel and uninstalled it.
hm i did that too but it didnt work for me :/

Any other league replay systems installed?  I had this problem yesterday with back to back complete system crashes as soon as game started and deleted SkinSpotlights Replay.  Just played a game fine.  Thank you Wittrock.  By any chance can we get a red comment on in game system for replays?  Or a riot supported tool?  It would be very nice for those trying to improve themselves at league.{{champion:45}}
OK, I take it back.  Just played a game and had video crash for 2-3 seconds but system recovered.  Something odd with this patch.  No other games or software doing this for me.
how can i check? i deleted lolreplay by control panel->uninstall a program->lolreplay ;/ idk how else to delete it

That would work for the other replay options out there as well.  Have you installed BraonReplays or Skin Spotlights Replays?  Those are the other two I know about.  Ultimately I am wondering if this is all irrelevant and the real problem is the player tooltips causing memory issues and the crashes.  I see that it has been disabled due to "...a rare but very nasty bug".  Maybe our experience is the bug?  I do not see that Riot clarified the nature of the bug and frankly waiting for a patch before I play again.  Just don't want to keep getting flagged as a leaver because the client crashes my computer.
None of those solutions helped including the ones RiotSupport offered. Tons of fps issues, unexplained lag, and crashing.

I dont crash like other people but my problem is abit similar.

So I still have my fairly good ping 60-70 (most people tell me thats good anyways)

However since the patch my awesome 30-40 fps average has dropped all the way down to 9-10 fps. (even when im using the lowest possible quality) 

Now to anyone who has lived this, knows its a HUGE pain in the but to aim any form of a skill shot, or even cs when the game is moving that slow. 

I know its not my internet, I have the same exact internet I did yesterday, I know its not my computer, im using the same exact computer I did yesterday.

If anything my computer should be running better which I feel it is for I just did some scans on it.

However my fps is still near unplayable while my ping is still great. And I dont get how that can even be possible. 

Any tips?

Been having the same issue. Went from averaging 60fps in a game, with Netflix running on another device, to barely pulling 20fps and nothing else using bandwidth. My pings stay low around 50-60 but that frame rate stays low. This is with lowest quality and no aliasing. Only encountered the performance issues after the latest patch.

Edit: Forgot to mention that it also seems to disconnect from PVP.net at least twice during the match queue post-patch.
try turning off anti aliasing off.

> [{quoted}](name=kaisergali,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=jEEw7piH,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2015-02-26T06:12:48.595+0000)
>
> try turning off anti aliasing off.

I did this, Still no help

Game went from 60 fps to 1 fps
same it just says its not responding riot plz fix

usually i get a pretty consistent ping of 60-70. I played a game today and the ping was fine but the next game i played i had 400 ping for the entire match. nothing changed on my end, upload and download to other websites was unaffected, other players in my game were also experiencing unusual lag. Does PBE do anything?
Maybe PBE does do something? I have no idea, it couldn't be anything else.. NONE of these fixes solve the issues for me.. idk
Im having "Firewall" issues was working fine till a few games into new patch
i am having the same issue and havnt been able to connect o probably my last 5 games now

5.4 gave me the blue screen of death. Trying again now.

Thanks riot
If on PC, go to bottom right corner where your volume is and everything. Should be a little UP arrow on the left of that bar. Click that and if LoLReplays is running, right-click it and exit.
That didn't seem to be the issue but.. is LoLreplays some bloatware that comes with LoL? Never heard of it
No, you actually have to download it yourslelf, so if you didn't download it then I have no idea what the problem is. :(
So I guess if we still have this issue and none of the above troubleshoot methods helped us, I guess we can't play at all right? Wonder if the riot support ticket will ever be answered..

OK! So Riot, you're leaver buster is in my opinion so overly stupid. I understand it scares people from leaving a game but I couldn't connect to a couple games due to connection, and the most recent game I wasn't able to connect because of your client. I tried everything on your support list and none of it worked. At the end of the game is the only time i could connect. The enemy team was unsportly as well as extremely negative and d**k I kindly ask that you remove my 20 minute leaver buster. It's extremely long and annoying when I don't deserve it. Also, not only did i disconnect, but also two of my friends had trouble connecting as well. The game we were in should have been a loss prevented.
Happened to me too. It happened before with logitech gears. However, I tried using the same solution this time, it does not work and I'm so pissed off

Has anyone tried deleting the Solutions folder?  It is located in the RADS folder in the main LoL directory.  When ever i get the "Unable to connect. Please check your firewall." message, I close the game, delete that folder and reboot the game it it works fine.  Hope that helps.  Dunno about the Ping though.

I also have to play with my Firewall disabled as Windows Firewall HATE LoL.
